name: SN Services
description: The first Open Source Enterprise Content Management platform for .NET.

name: SN Installer
description: A desktop application for installing sensenet ECM from scratch, or executing upgrade packages.

name: SN Admin
description: Upgrade and package executor tool for sensenet ECM.

name: SN Tools
description: General .Net tools that can be used even in sensenet ECM-independent projects.

name: SN Taskmanager
description: A standalone .Net component for managing long-running background tasks in any application.

name: SN Security
description: A powerful .Net component for managing permission entries in content repositories.

name: SN Webpages
description: UI layer for the sensenet ECM platform built using ASP.NET pages, webparts and controls.

name: SN Workflow
description: Workflow component for the sensenet ECM platform, based on Windows Workflow Foundation 4.5

name: SN Workspaces
description: Workspace-related content for the sensenet ECM platform.

name: SN Client .NET
description: A .Net client for sensenet ECM that makes it easy to use the REST API of the Content Repository.

name: SN Client JS
description: A JavaScript client for sensenet ECM that makes it easy to use the REST API of the Content Repository.

name: SN Client CLI
description: Command line tool for the sensenet Platform's Client Library

name: SN Redux
description: A set of redux actions, reducers and redux-ovbservable epics for sensenet ECM.

name: SN Controls Aurelia
description: Aurelia controls for sensenet ECM

name: SN Controls React
description: React controls for sensenet ECM

name: SN Benchmark
description: A benchmark tool to measure the performance of a sensenet ECM instance across changes.

name: SenseNet Filesize Report Generator
description: This is a tool which generates reports about the file sizes in the SenseNet ECM.

name: SenseNet Project Installer
description: Dev project installer for sensenet ECMS.

name: SenseNet Subtree Lucene Fixer
description: Custom ContentCollection view to compare repository content structure and lucene index structure of a subtree, and try to fix any differences.

name: SenseNet Preview Cleaner
description: Tool cleaning preview images.

name: RepoSync
description: A framework to let you syncronize sensenet content between sensenet ECM and other systems.

name: Todo App with React, Redux and sensenet ECM
Todo App with Angular, Redux and sensenet ECM
Todo App with Angular2, Redux and sensenet ECM
Todo App with Aurelia, Redux and sensenet ECM
Todo App with Vue, Redux and sensenet ECM
sensenet.github.io
description: Source code for the community website of sensenet ECM developers. It's made with Jekyll, hosted on GitHub Pages.

name: SN Resources
description: The place of sensenet ECM related downloadable resources.
